main event: A bright light blue object was observed splitting into two while emitting a tail, resembling a meteor sighting.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 20 seconds,The object changed from one to two during the observation,The object was described as having a blue and white light and making no sound,The report concludes that the object was an astronomical meteor,The location of the sighting was La Jolla Beach, California.
sighted object: one bright light blue object splitting into two with a tail
